title: HamiltonCommunity
author: HamiltonCommunity
created_time: November 26, 2023, 06:24:24 PMLast edit: December 24, 2023, 05:18:32 PM by HamiltonCommunity
content: ★ Website★ Litepaper★ Twitter★ TG Community★TG Announcement1. Project name BitStarters bounty campaign will last for 4 weeks and managed by Hamilton Management Service.2. By joining this campaign, all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.3. All participants must join/follow the OFFICIAL SOCIAL ACCOUNTS of Project name BitStarters below to get accepted.4. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.5. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.6. All reports (Twitter, etc) should be sent at the end of week on this thread.Ptoof of authenticationQuoteFormat:#Proof Of RegistrationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:Polygon Wallet Address:● Twitter:  50%● Telegram: 30%● Video: 20%Please submit your weekly report on this bounty threadWeek 1 (27.11 - 03.12)Week 2 (04.12 - 10.12)Week 3 (11.12 - 17.12)Week 4 (18.12 - 24.12)Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules. 1. Every participant must follow Project BitStarters Twitter Page2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week.4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 24 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #BITS #AIRDROP #Crypto #BINANCE Hashtag in every retweet or tweetWeekly Report FormatQuoteTwitter CampaignTwitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …       Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | BitStarters(Example: Hamilton | BitStarters )2. Replace your profile picture with this Logo 3. Every participant must join the Project BitStarters official Group.4. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.5. Spam post deleted messages will not be counted.6. You must stay in the telegram group until The end of The campaign       Rewards:1. Average quality -1 Stake2. Good quality - 2 Stake3. High quality - 3 Stake4. Excellent quality: 4 StakeRules:1. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length & must have at least 500 subscribers Video contents must focus on a relevant topic project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.2. Video must be English others local Language is not accepted3 . All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.4 . Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified5. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification6. Each participant can send 1 video only. ( Youtube & Tiktok)Note: Youtube Videos Minimum 200/250 Views & tiktok Videos Minimum 500+ Views Need
